body: @aloofguy7 bro, today there some author draw NTR of this series, doujin from another doujin, I don't even know if that author got permission from raita or not, but I laugh at it since there are people that need this series to be NTR, but raita not gonna do that so they draw it themself.

apolloladdie, thank you for the info/history of Hentai Haven! I think I visited it before, but yes, some while ago. 
Yes, the first and second are basically “anthologies”, with episodes in the series collected in one place.

BTW, is it just me, or does the 1st one and 2nd one just seem like summaries of like the first 4/5 books, and similarly the 2nd one is the next set of books. the 3rd one and this one seem like extra's that fit between some books, but are not directly ripped off the pages of the other books.

MaikeruSama
HH was HentaiHaven. It was a free Hentai Video page (read - pirated and translated). It was shut down for some reason (probably legal), never to be returned. However, it was recently absorbed into Fakku (which was also completely free like 2 years ago, but not anymore) to stay alive. Now, anything hentai that was on HentaiHaven for free is now behind Fakku's Paywall unless you search for other pages to find the same videos

So, even tho book2 isn’t translated, all the components of it, and others in the series are all available translated on Raita’s pages on this site. 
A question to purpleprose and disleeper , who or what is/was HH? And how can I access the info you suggest, as I’m not on a laptop or pc, just a pad.
"This isn't sex by the way". Seems legit...

For those asking:
Book 1: https://nhentai.net/g/58273/
Book 2 (no translation as of yet regrettably): https://nhentai.net/g/63952/
Book 3: https://nhentai.net/g/129043/
